Ingredients.4: 1 (16 ounce) can B&M® Original Baked Beans

Ingredients.5: 1 (15.5 ounce) can Joan of Arc® Dark Red Kidney Beans

Ingredients.6: 1 (15 ounce) can Joan of Arc® Spicy Chili Beans

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Cook bacon in large nonstick skillet until crisp. Remove bacon to paper towel. Remove all but 3 tablespoons bacon fat. Add onion and pepper and cook 5 minutes or until softened.

Directions.2: Add beans, BBQ sauce, and half the bacon and bring to a boil.

Directions.3: Transfer beans to 1 1/2-quart baking dish. Cover with aluminum foil and bake 20 minutes or until bubbling.

Directions.4: Remove foil and top with cheese and reserved bacon. Bake 5 minutes or until cheese is melted.
